name: Mirror Quest (WillWroble)
description:
WASD to move

b to undo

both clones move in the same way, but you need them to enter the blue key tiles at the same time. Use the solid objects on the stage to move one without the other. 

NOTE you can not move off the stage; this is an illegal move so nether clone will move.

beating a stage gives a star. beating a stage in the minimum amount of moves gives a gold star.

Technically on the app store but I put it there 3 years ago and haven't updated it so don't expect it to download on latest iOS lol

Also full screen works but will make the level select look weird since it was designed for mobile.
